text.div:
Care Connect Condition Relationship

A CodeSystem that identifies the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition or problem.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 HL7 UK

This code system https://hl7.org.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/CareConnect-ConditionRelationship-1 defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
merge-combine Merge/Combine This condition is merged/combined with the target condition to form a single logical condition.
nesting Nesting This target condition is a component problem of this condition.
evolve Evolve This condition has evolved from the target condition.
parent Parent The problem referenced is the parent of the problem/item in the resource.
child Child The problem referenced is the child of the problem/item in the resource.
sibling Sibling The problem referenced is a sibling of the problem/item in the resource.
